column2: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can use this casus belli to declare war on §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! with the help of [Root.GetHerHis] faction.
Faction of [Actor.GetTitledFirstName]'s War to Oust Foreigners
Foreigners are an blister on the face of §Y[From.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§! and must be rooted out!
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! can use this casus belli to declare war on the infidel §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! with the help of [Root.GetHerHis] faction.
Faction of [Actor.GetTitledFirstName]'s War to Oust Infidels
Infidels are an blister on the face of §Y[From.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§! and must be rooted out!
Faction of [Actor.GetTitledFirstName]'s War to Establish Tributary for Liege
What could be better for the prosperity of §Y[From.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§! than foreign exotic goods that come free of cost!
All members of the §YFaction of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! who have pledged war support AND do not have a non-aggression pact with §Y[From.GetTitledName]§! will be called to war.
Has at least one member in [Root.GetHerHis] faction.
